citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The program of veterinary care indicates annual visits are required by the attending veterinarian however the licensee
states that it has been over a year since the attending veterinarian has visited the facility.
A written program of veterinary care along with regularly scheduled visits to the premises is important for maintaining
animal health. Correct by having an up-to-date written program of veterinary care in place including regularly scheduled
visits by the attending veterinarian. Correct by October 31, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The program of veterinary care indicates annual visits are required by the attending veterinarian however the licensee 
states that it has been over a year since the attending veterinarian has visited the facility. 
 
A written program of veterinary care along with regularly scheduled visits to the premises is important for maintaining 
animal health. Correct by having an up-to-date written program of veterinary care in place including regularly scheduled 
visits by the attending veterinarian. Correct by October 31, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
